mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.GOODS_NO, A.BASKET_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.BASKET_GOODS_AMOUNT, A.GOODS_ATT_NO, E.GOODS_ATT_SIZE, E.GOODS_ATT_COLOR, D.GOODS_NAME, D.GOODS_SELL_PRICE, U.UPLOAD_SAVE_NAME FROM BASKET A, GOODS D, GOODS_ATTRIBUTE E, UPLOAD U WHERE A.MEMBER_NO=1 AND A.GOODS_NO=D.GOODS_NO AND A.GOODS_ATT_NO=E.GOODS_ATT_NO AND A.GOODS_NO=U.GOODS_NO
